snippet: The top United Nations nuclear monitoring official expressed renewed pessimism on Friday about negotiations with Iran, set for next week.
abstract: Top United Nations nuclear monitoring official expresses renewed pessimism about negotiations with Iran.
lead_paragraph: The top United Nations nuclear monitoring official expressed renewed pessimism on Friday about negotiations with Iran, set for next week.

headline.seo: Little Hope Seen for Iran Nuclear Talks
headline.main: Little Hope Seen for Iran Nuclear Talks
headline.print_headline: Little Hope Seen for Iran Nuclear Talks
